channel.title: New local problems on FixMyStreet
channel.description: The latest local problems reported by users

item.title: 4 pot holes outside house, 21st March
item.description:
Potholes are making it difficult to reverse onto my drive

item.description:

item.title: RoW inaccessible, 21st March
item.description:
The RoW after leaving the private garden with RoW in it hasn’t been kept and is inaccessible. I was forced to enter the private field that had a resident horse in it. The bridge on the other side has been replaced, but the access to get to the bridge hasn’t been addressed. ///rating.puns.name

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): Rudgeley House Cold Pool Lane, Badgeworth
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Entire stretch of road is falling to bits, 21st March
item.description:
Massive pot holes all the way from Albert Road roundabout to past the BP garage on Prestbury Rd. It's been awful for years and it's appalling now. The entire stretch needs resurfacing.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 73 Prestbury Road, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Awful repair, 21st March
item.description:
I reported this pot hole a few weeks ago. I came home last week to find this "repair". Do you really think that is satisfactory? Some tarmac bodged in a hole and already falling to bits. The substone that was coming out of the hole hasn't even been cleared and is sticking out. Is no one accountable these days. Make the useless contractors come and do it properly, otherwise the hole will reappear in a few weeks.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 40 Oakland Avenue, Cheltenham
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Very loose stone slab., 21st March
item.description:
This large stone slab has been progressively getting dislodged and loose over the course of a number of weeks. It is a potential trip hazard to people walking to and from their cars. It has also caused damage to cars alloys that have been turning in the cup-de-sac as one side flicks up if driven over. It either needs replacing or re-fitting into the ground.

Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 54 Sedgley Road, Bishops Cleeve
Report on FixMyStreet

item.title: Large puddle on the corner, 21st March
item.description:
A large puddle appears after rain. Suspect there is a blocked drain. Hazard for both motorists and pedestrians.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by Bing Maps): 3 East End Road, Charlton Kings
